revised_title: A Case Study of a Child's Survival Underwater for 15 Minutes
tldr: A three-year-old girl fell into a milldam and remained underwater for 15 minutes. She survived due to her large foramen ovale, which allowed her to have more blood flow to her lungs. The girl's leg got caught under a mill-wheel, and she was trapped for some time. She eventually survived but suffered severe leg injuries and passed away a few days later.
